rules_text:
[i]Discipline[/i] – Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
[i]Magical Mastery[/i] – Whenever you cast a instant or sorcery, as long as you have two or more instant and. or sorcery cards in your graveyard copy it.
[i]Blessing of Mila[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control.
